choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
To compare two columns of a pandas DataFrame, you can use the following code:
```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
df = sns.load_pandas().iris
sns.pairplot(df) # This will show all pairwise combinations of variables in the dataframe
plt.scatter(df['sepal_length'], df['sepal_width']) # This will plot sepal length and width on x and y axis respectively
```
